title: Artillery Mage

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - During the day, fire a powerful long-range spell into the air at a target.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of the night, all players will be notified that a massive burst of energy shot up from an unknown location.
- At the end of the next night, the spell will come down. If the target does not visit, then it will deal an Unstoppable Rampage attack.
- You are Astral.
- With the Necronomicon, the spell will always deal an Unstoppable Rampage and Coven members become immune.

desc:
Post 4051
*What's better than summoning a piece of artillery? Being the piece of artillery.*
